welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Griffith, a charming city known for its friendly atmosphere and stunning landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport is a modern and efficient facility with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of cargo, including perishables, live animals, and oversized freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Porter County Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
